en_text: Because I was able to control the Nirvash better than you, right?
jp_text:
うまくニルヴァーシュを
扱えたから…
google_translated:
Umaku Nirvash
Because I handled it ...

en_text: That's why.
jp_text: だから…

en_text:
I always want to be at Eureka's side.
I want to give her strength.
jp_text:
いつだってエウレカの
そばにいたい 力になりたい
google_translated:
Always Eureka
I want to be the power that I wanted to be

en_text: I have a dream, too. And things I want to do.
jp_text: 僕にだって夢があるんだ
google_translated: I have a dream for me

en_text: I am who I am.
jp_text: 僕は僕なんだ

en_text: I want to ride the Nirvash a lot more.
jp_text:
（レントン）もっと
ニルヴァーシュを動かしてみたい
google_translated:
More
I want to move Nirvacu

en_text: Because, right now, I feel like I can finally do something.
jp_text: 今なら何かできる気がするから
google_translated: Because I feel something I can do now

en_text:
Arriving at the cave within the ruins
of a city, the Gekko rests its wings.
jp_text:
（ナレーション）たどり着いた
廃虚の街の洞窟で―
google_translated:
I arrived
In the cave of the ruble city-

en_text:
Within the dim boundaries
between this world and another,
jp_text:
ほの暗い 現世と異界の
はざまにおいて―

en_text:
they once again find a way
to release themselves.
jp_text: 彼らは再び邂逅(かいこう)する
